exercises.name: Pec Stretch (Neck, Right Shoulder)
exercises.instructions: Stand in a doorway with your arm at a 90-degree angle. Gently lean forward until you feel a stretch in your chest. Hold the stretch without causing shoulder pain.
exercises.importance: Helps relieve tension in the pectoral muscles and improve posture.
exercises.raw_text:
Pec Stretch (Neck, Right Shoulder)
Frequency: 3 sets x 30 seconds daily
Instructions: Stand in a doorway with your arm at a 90-degree angle.
Gently lean forward until you feel a stretch in your chest.
Importance: Helps relieve tension in the pectoral muscles and improve posture.

exercises.name: Neck Retractions (Neck)
exercises.instructions: Sit or stand with your back straight. Gently pull your head back, keeping your chin tucked. Hold for a moment, then release.
exercises.importance: Improves neck posture and reduces strain on the cervical spine.
exercises.raw_text:
Neck Retractions (Neck)
Frequency: 3 sets x 10 reps daily
Instructions: Sit or stand with your back straight.
Importance: Improves neck posture and reduces strain on the cervical spine.

exercises.name: Scapular Retractions (Right Shoulder)
exercises.instructions: Stand or sit with your arms at your sides. Squeeze your shoulder blades together, hold, and release.
exercises.importance: Strengthens the muscles around the shoulder blades to improve posture.
exercises.raw_text:
Scapular Retractions (Right Shoulder)
Frequency: 3 sets x 10 reps daily
Instructions: Stand or sit with your arms at your sides.
Importance: Strengthens the muscles around the shoulder blades to improve posture.

goals.description: Next Milestone: 80% right rotation in two weeks
goals.raw_text: Next Milestone: 80% right rotation in two weeks

goals.description: End Goal: Equal neck rotation both ways
goals.raw_text: End Goal: Equal neck rotation both ways

goals.description: Next Milestone: Lift 5 kg overhead pain-free in two weeks
goals.raw_text: Next Milestone: Lift 5 kg overhead pain-free in two weeks

goals.description: End Goal: Lift 20 kg overhead pain-free
goals.raw_text: End Goal: Lift 20 kg overhead pain-free

dos: Use a sit-to-stand desk to vary posture throughout the day
Apply ice to the shoulder if sore after exercises
Perform prescribed exercises daily to aid recovery
donts: Avoid sleeping on the affected side to reduce symptoms
Do not perform overhead lifting until cleared by physiotherapist
Avoid activities that exacerbate neck and shoulder pain

appointments.raw_text: Physiotherapy sessions 2x per week for first 3 weeks
Physiotherapy sessions 1x per week for second 3 weeks

conditions.diagnosis: Moderate foraminal stenosis at C6/7 and C5/6
conditions.raw_text: Moderate foraminal stenosis at C6/7 and C5/6

conditions.diagnosis: Right supraspinatus tear, tendinosis, bursitis, impingement
conditions.raw_text: Right supraspinatus tear, tendinosis, bursitis, impingement
